LanguageData.DC_OnlyAboveQuality: Only autorepair apparel of quality {0} or higher
LanguageData.DC_OnlyAboveQualityTT: Apparel with a quality-level below the selected quality will deteriorate as normal
LanguageData.DC_IgnoreCategoriesTooltip: Selected categories will be ignored by the mod and will be affected as usual by the vanilla durability loss
LanguageData.DC_FullRepairTooltip: When enabled, fully repairs all clothing instead of simply stopping degradation.
LanguageData.DC_WearDamageTooltip: Instead of no deterioration, you can change it to a percent of the original here.
